text:
David Beckham feeds ducks on day out with Victoria

The 44-year-old made the most of the good weather today, as she took a stroll with the former professional footballer. Treating fans to a clip from their day out, David could be seen feeding some ducks as the duo spent time in a park. The fashion-forward star sported an all-black ensemble, as he donned a pair of jeans, a hooded jumper and matching flat cap. Laughing at the attention the animals were paying to the 43-year-old, Victoria teased her husband over his popularity. As she videoed her spouse, the former Spice Girls star exclaimed: “Even the ducks like you!”

David Beckham is even popular with the ducks and swans. Victoria Beckham

Turning to speak to viewers, she went on: “Honestly he is like the pied-piper. They are literally all following him.” Beside the clip, the star wrote: “@davidbeckham is even popular with the ducks and swans.” It came shortly after Victoria had uploaded a snap of the duo’s daughter, Harper Seven. In the capture, the youngster could be seen donning a gingham purple dress and white socks, as she prepared to make her way to school. And, as well as sporting her school uniform, the six-year-old wore a mask of her father’s face.

Victoria Beckham Instagram: The former Spice Girls star poked fun at husband David

Victoria Beckham Instagram: David Beckham was pictured feeding the ducks during their stroll

Victoria Beckham Instagram: The singer filmed her husband as they enjoyed their day out

Laughing about the sight, the mother-of-four captioned the upload: “Look who we found walking to school today! @davidbeckham.” The singer’s 20.5 million Instagram followers rushed to share their delight with the fashion designer, with one exclaiming: “You guys are adorable!”(sic) Another follower giggled: “Haha love it, great job father and daughter.” “Like father, like daughter,” penned a third. Meanwhile, a fourth fan teased: ”Look at young David’s first day at school, doesn’t she looks adorable?”

Victoria Beckham Instagram: The fashion designer was branded 'miserable' at the Royal Wedding 2018

Kirsty Young on Victoria Beckham: She could crack a smile
